greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of 2*e.
comment: Simple continued fraction is A081750. - _Michael Somos_, May 07 2012
Equals lim_{x->1} (x*e^x - e)/(x-1).  Also 2e = sum_{n>=0} sum_{k=0..n} 1/n!. - _Richard R. Forberg_, Dec 23 2014
link: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
